about_the_game:
GlobeXplore: The Ultimate Flight Experience

about Globexplore

GlobeXplore is the ultimate flight simulation game that allows you to explore every spot on Earth, from famous landmarks all over the world to your own home.
For those fed up with recent drone regulations, utilizing Google Earth's 3D data allows you to explore the world from perspectives never seen before, without any special qualifications or applications, in landscapes just like in real life.
This software, created by Japan's ozora in May 2023, has been further polished and evolved with its release on Steam.

features Of Globexplore

    [/h2]
  • Exploring a world indistinguishable from reality: Harnessing Google Earth's 3D data to provide a flight experience as if you are actually there! From the bustling Times Square filled with tourists to the tranquil Swiss Alps, your very own adventure in this world begins now.
  • An operating experience just like real drones: By adopting the same control sensitivity as actual drones, you can immediately switch to your usual settings if you are an advanced user!
  • Instant travel across the world: With just one click, you can instantly fly anywhere in the world. From the top of the Eiffel Tower to the heart of the Colosseum, travel wherever you wish!
  • Discovering new spots: By exploring within the game and identifying new landmarks from your current location, visiting those spots will open the door to new adventures!
  • Suitable for beginners to advanced pilots: From a level hold mode (Angle Mode) easy for anyone to start with, to Acro Mode for advanced pilots, we offer optimal flight for all pilots.
  • Community: Exchange ideas, report bugs, and propose functional improvements in our dedicated Discord community, and let's build the world of GlobeXplore together.

let the Adventure Begin!

GlobeXplore is not just a game, but a platform for those hungry for adventure. Cutting-edge technology provides an overwhelming sense of immersion on the vast map of Earth, waiting for you.
Experience GlobeXplore on Steam now and explore the unknown world!

If you need support please check this page.

short_description: Fly around the world with GlobeXplore, the ultimate drone flight simulator using Google Earth data. Enjoy real-drone-like controls over any city without special permits. Discover the world from unique viewpoints, free from the constraints of recent drone regulations, in lifelike landscapes
